is this everything i need to play dayz it looks so fun i really wanna try it

Known problems/bug and solutions

On server startup you get missing "arma2profile" error
- You not copied the server into the ArmA 2 CO folder

On server startup you get missing pbo error
- You have Steam version of ArmA 2 and you skipped the 0 point

Stuck on Loading screen or after join you see "Wrong version..."
- Disable UAC in Windows 7 fix these problems

Vehicles not spawn on the map
- Apply the Vehicles Installer (not 100% yet)
